edu.stanford.slac.aida.lib.util

Class AidaPVHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.slac.aida.lib.util.AidaPVHelper

  • public class AidaPVHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides many functions that help with processing EPICS `Process Variables`. APDA-PVA receives data from EPICS in PVField and PVStructure, and we send data back to the EPICS network using the these same data types.

    This class provides functions that convert to and from AIDA-PVA java types, and enables creation of the structures and norms required to reply to, and decipher EPICS network requests and data.

    Furthermore, we use Normative Types to represent data in a standard way. This is layered on top of Process Variables. So this class also provides constants and standard structures for use with Normative Types. AIDA-PVA Normative Types Documentation

      static java.lang.String NT_FIELD_NAME
      The Normative Type specification defines the name of the field containing the value part of its main types (Scalar, ScalarArray, and Table) as "value".
      static java.lang.String NT_LABELS_NAME
      The Normative Type specification defines the name of the field containing the labels part of its Table type as "labels".
      static org.epics.pvdata.pv.PVStructure NT_SCALAR_ARRAY_EMPTY_STRUCTURE
      Shortcut for a complete empty PVStructure containing an NTScalarArray when no data is returned
      static org.epics.pvdata.pv.PVStructure NT_SCALAR_EMPTY_STRUCTURE
      Shortcut for a complete empty NTTable PVStructure for when no data is returned from the Native Channel Provider from a request
      static org.epics.pvdata.pv.PVStructure NT_TABLE_EMPTY_STRUCTURE
      Shortcut for a complete empty PVStructure containing an NTTable when no data is returned

    • Method Detail

      • asScalar

        public static org.epics.pvdata.pv.PVStructure asScalar(java.lang.Object value)
        Convert an arbitrary value to a PVStructure containing an `NTScalar`

        The value must be the java equivalent of one of the supported AIDA-PVA scalar types - Boolean, Byte, Short, - Integer, Long, Float, - Double or String

        Parameters:
        value - java equivalent of one of the supported AIDA-PVA scalar types
        Returns:
        PVStructure containing an NTScalar with the value

      • asScalarArray

        public static org.epics.pvdata.pv.PVStructure asScalarArray(java.util.List<?> values)
        Convert an arbitrary list of values to a PVStructure containing an `NTScalarArray`

        The value must be the java List of a type equivalent of one of the supported AIDA-PVA scalar types - Boolean, Byte, Short, - Integer, Long, Float, - Double or String

        Parameters:
        values - the list of values to convert
        Returns:
        PVStructure containing an `NTScalarArray` with the values

      • asNtTable

        public static org.epics.pvdata.pv.PVStructure asNtTable(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> values,
                                                        AidaChannelConfig aidaChannelConfig)
        Convert an arbitrary list of homogeneously sized columns of values to a PVStructure containing an `NTTable` The value of each of the columns must be a java List of a type equivalent of one of the supported AIDA-PVA scalar types - Boolean, Byte, Short, - Integer, Long, Float, - Double or String
        Parameters:
        values - the list of values
        aidaChannelConfig - the configuration
        Returns:
        the returned PVStructure containing the NT_TABLE

      • fieldToString

        public static java.lang.String fieldToString(org.epics.pvdata.pv.PVField field,
                                             java.lang.String fieldPath,
                                             java.util.List<FloatArgument> floatArgumentList,
                                             java.util.List<DoubleArgument> doubleArgumentList)
                                      throws org.epics.pvaccess.server.rpc.RPCRequestException
        Extract the String value from the field Any time a double or float is found, add it to the appropriate map under the `fieldPath` key
        Parameters:
        field - the field
        fieldPath - path under which this field sits. Used only for floats and doubles that need to set the path so the name in the pair is prefixed with this value if set
        floatArgumentList - to return the list of floats found and the paths
        doubleArgumentList - to return the list of doubles found and the paths
        Returns:
        the extracted value
        Throws:
        org.epics.pvaccess.server.rpc.RPCRequestException - of the field type is unsupported

      • structureFieldToString

        public static java.lang.String structureFieldToString(org.epics.pvdata.pv.PVStructure field,
                                                      java.lang.String fieldPath,
                                                      java.util.List<FloatArgument> floatArgumentList,
                                                      java.util.List<DoubleArgument> doubleArgumentList)
                                               throws org.epics.pvaccess.server.rpc.RPCRequestException
        Convert the PVStructure field to the json string representation of a structure of that field, storing any ieee values found unchanged in the given FloatArgumentand DoubleArgument lists
        Parameters:
        field - the PVStructure field
        fieldPath - the absolute path to the field from the root
        floatArgumentList - the FloatArgument list to store any ieee values
        doubleArgumentList - the DoubleArgument list to store any ieee values
        Returns:
        the json string representation of the PVStructure
        Throws:
        org.epics.pvaccess.server.rpc.RPCRequestException - if anything bad happens

      • arrayFieldToStringList

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> arrayFieldToStringList(org.epics.pvdata.pv.PVArray array,
                                                                      java.lang.String fieldPath,
                                                                      java.util.List<FloatArgument> floatArgumentList,
                                                                      java.util.List<DoubleArgument> doubleArgumentList)
                                                               throws org.epics.pvaccess.server.rpc.RPCRequestException
        Extract array fields as a list of strings. recurse as necessary.
        Parameters:
        array - any PV array
        fieldPath - the absolute path to the field from the root
        floatArgumentList - to return the list of floats found and the paths
        doubleArgumentList - to return the list of doubles found and the paths
        Returns:
        the list of strings for this array
        Throws:
        org.epics.pvaccess.server.rpc.RPCRequestException - when there is an unsupported type
